Blackmail which makes up a huge chunk of NTR is either retarded "debt" plots, office bullshit, a creepy teacher, or meme tier goon types all of which in a "real world" setting in Japan get easily resolved with a ring to the old 110 for the Keisatsu. But then we wouldn't have a plot, so we have to make female lead and the cheated on male as retarded as possible, lol.
For those wondering Pages 41 - 80  are the stories with a male MC who doesn't get NTRed.

Like there is nothing worst than the enemy or smt like that, or the training with absolutely obey of the chief and the duty to finish the job. Marika-chan: Sike!!! Reverse Uno Card!!! I wanna have your baby... Marry Me!!!
Ayumu-kun: You better compared to your Mom... Let's get married.
Mommy: My daughter NTRD Me!!!
...
Fuckin' brilliant!!! Now, Chapter 1 to 4 and 7 to 9... I probably won't read, yet... I'm still to soft for that, especially the Ninja Girl Gang Bang... I can't, but other than that... It's a F@CKING entertaining read!!! Good Job!!!

This is a masterpiece. Yeah the idea of being blackmailed by the leaking of a husband having sex with his wife seems ridiculous to western people but these kinda stories are rooted in a very old fashioned Asian concept of losing face where even the smallest of embarrassments are assumed to be catastrophic and worth keeping secret at all costs. Of course what ntr builds off that can appear crazy to us from the west but it’s a common trope in Japan for a reason

You won't be shunned by people, the one who will be shunned are the one who took the pic. Come on author, if you can't fit in a plot for NTR, dont make one. You're just ruining the genre.
